body: Hello guys i want to just say thanks to Fluenza for accepting my appeal thank you soo much mate ;D I will never forget this ever in my life thank you sooo much.

replies.body: Could you please tell me what damage i could do to the server as a whole by seeing this one appeal thread? I've dealt with countless appeals as a Senior Mod. So i don't see the harm in seeing the reply on a appeal thread.. I'm just curious to see what Jozz said.
